description.narrative: The Program for Biosafety Systems (PBS) has over 10 years of experience working with policy-makers, regulators and scientists in Africa and SE Asia to provide policy advice and build capacity for informed decision-making about agricultural biotechnology innovations. PBS uses an integrated approach of legal, technical and communications services. PBS creates an enabling.environment which allows for the uptake and adoption of improved plant varieties which supports the GFSS goal of reducing global hunger, malnutrition,and poverty.
